title: The After Show with Justo Eiroa from JRE Tobacco
itunes:title: The After Show with Justo Eiroa from JRE Tobacco
description:
Today, Justo Eiroa joins the after show to talk about JRE Tobacco and answers some questions about Honduran tobacco and the company’s Aladino line of cigars. The After show is brought to you by Roma Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
